title: Are We Getting Gears of War 6?
description:
Are we finally going to get Gears of War 6? From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x2PBbxN9HT0

Download Vampire Survivors on Switch, PC, Xbox, and Mobile RIGHT NOW! PlayStation coming soon!

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

TikTok:  https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames?lang=en
